summary: The mad adventures of the mad Italians, searching for the mad treasures in the mad Russia.
cast: Andrey Mironov|Ninetto Davoli|Antonia Santilli|Alighiero Noschese|Tano Cimarosa|Evgeniy Evstigneev|Olga Aroseva|Gigi Ballista|Vadim Grachyov|Zoya Isaeva|King|Aleksandr Lukyanov|Yuri Mikhajlov|Ella Nekrasova|Boris Runge|Franca Sciutto|Larisa Vikkel|Valeri Vinogradov|Sergey Yurtaykin
director: Directors: Francesco Prosperi (as Franco Prosperi), Eldar Ryazanov
title: Neveroyatnye priklyucheniya italyantsev v Rossii
